package.name: YOOCHOOSE_Recommender_Engine
package.summary: Use our superior and patented recommender engine to boost your online sales with personalized and self-learning recommendations.
package.description: All leading online shops have already identifies the enormous revenue potential of professional recommendation services. Our experiences with other online shops show that a sales growth of up to 20% can be expected. Recommendation types supported by the extension: People who bought this product, also bought that. People who searched for this kind of product, finally bought this. Best sellers. Personalized recommendations: Products recommended according to the user's click or buy.
